001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LogicalDataSets;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
016
017public class AdalineMain {
018
019    public static void main(String[] args) {
020        DataSet<Float> dataSet = LogicalDataSets.toMinusSet(new LinesAndCircles().load());
021        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
022        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
023
024        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(400, 8);
025        ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective = Objectives.mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
026        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.01f);
027        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
028        epochRmePlotter.display();
029        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100,
030                epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")"),
031                epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)).stochastic();
032        Trainer<Adaline, Float> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
033        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
034
035        int i = 0;
036        int correct = 0;
037        int wrong = 0;
038        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
039            i++;
040            Array<Boolean> estimate = adaline.classify(sample.features());
041            Array<Boolean> target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.0f);
042            if (!Array.equals(target, estimate)) {
043                wrong++;
044                String label = createLabel(i, target, estimate);
045                ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, fromMinusSet(sample));
046                image.display();
047            } else {
048                correct++;
049            }
050        }
051        if (wrong == 0) {
052            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = testSet.samples().getFirst();
053            Array<Boolean> estimate = adaline.classify(sample.features());
054            Array<Boolean> target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.0f);
055            String label = createLabel(1, target, estimate);
056            ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, fromMinusSet(sample));
057            image.display();
058        }
059        System.out.println("Correct: " + correct + ", Wrong: " + wrong + ", Total: " + (correct + wrong));
060    }
061
062    private static DataSet.Sample<Float> fromMinusSet(DataSet.Sample<Float> sample) {
063        Array<Float> features = sample.features();
064        for (int i = 0; i < features.length(); i++) {
065            if (Floats.equals(features.get(i), -1.0f)) {
066                features.set(i, 0.0f);
067            }
068        }
069        return new DataSet.Sample<>(features, sample.targetOutputs());
070    }
071
072    private static String createLabel(int i, Array<Boolean> target, Array<Boolean> estimate) {
073        String label = "";
074        boolean wrong = false;
075        label += estimate.get(0) ? "Circle " : "Line ";
076        if (target.get(0) != estimate.get(0)) {
077            wrong = true;
078        }
079        label += estimate.get(1) ? "Left" : "Right";
080        if (target.get(1) != estimate.get(1)) {
081            wrong = true;
082        }
083        return i + ". " + (wrong ? "X: " : "V: ") + label;
084    }
085
086}
